channel.title: Sprite and raw folder
channel.description:
so my sprites and raw folder are in my cache.
i changed this [code]public String location = "./Sprites/";[/code] to this [code]public String location = sign.signlink.findcachedir() + "Sprites/";[/code] so that my sprites would load from my cache. which worked. but how would i go about doing that for my "raw" folder so i can put it in my cache and loads from there.
